summary: Feature request to add query support when listing schedules in the PHP SDK, matching the functionality already available for listing workflows.
userImpact: Users cannot filter schedules when listing them, requiring them to retrieve all schedules and filter client-side, reducing efficiency.
proposedFix: Add query parameter support to the schedule listing operation, mirroring the existing workflow listing query functionality.
resolutionDetails: Query support was implemented for schedule listing operations
keyQuote: Need to support the query option when listing schedules same as we do when listing workflows.
